document.full_text: algerian president abdelaziz bouteflika will soon release several thousand islamists from prison to help draw a line under a conflict that killed an estimated 200,000 people, two prominent islamists told reuters.
document.title: algeria to free jailed militants: islamist leaders
lines_and_colors: algerian president abdelaziz bouteflika will soon release several thousand islamists from prison to help draw a line under a conflict that killed an estimated 200,000 people, two prominent islamists told reuters.
